question.eng: How useful was the information or service you received? Please choose (1.USEFUL,) (2.NOT USEFUL)
question.sw: Je, ulionaje huduma yetu? Tafadhali chagua: (1.MUHIMU,) (2.SIO MUHIMU)

question.eng: Okay. What information or service  would you want us to provide. Please type your response:
question.sw: Sawa. Je! Ungetaka tutoe habari gani au huduma gani? Tafadhali andika majibu yako:

question.eng: Well noted. How easy was it for you to access the information you required? Please choose (1.EASY,) (2.HARD)
question.sw: Imebainika vizuri. Je, ilikuwa rahisi kwako kupata habari uliyohitaji? Tafadhali chagua: (1.RAHISI 2.SIO RAHISI)

question.eng: You're almost done! How can i make it easier? Please type your response:
question.sw: Uko karibu kumaliza! Ninawezaje kuifanya iwe rahisi? Tafadhali andika majibu yako:

question.eng: Thank you. How would you rate your overall experience with our services? Please choose (1.EXCELLENT,) (2.POOR)
question.sw: Imebainika vizuri. Je, ilikuwa rahisi kwako kupata habari uliyohitaji? Tafadhali chagua: (1.BORA 2.MBAYA)

question.eng: Lastly, how can i make our experience better? Please type your response:
question.sw: Mwishowe, ninawezaje kufanya uzoefu wetu kuwa bora?? Tafadhali andika majibu yako:

question.eng: Thank you very much for your feedback. We appreciate your support. Please choose from (1.MAIN MENU) to continue using the service.
question.sw: Asante sana kwa maoni yako. Tunakushukuru kw kutuunga mkono. Tafadhali chagua (1.MAIN MENU) kuendelea kutumia huduma yetu.
